definition: relating to or showing a difference, a bevel gear that permits rotation of two shafts at different speeds
details:
adjective
- relating to or showing a difference
= example: relating to or showing a difference
- involving or containing one or more derivatives
= example: involving or containing one or more derivatives
noun
- a bevel gear that permits rotation of two shafts at different speeds
= synonyms: differential gear
- a quality that differentiates between similar things
- the result of mathematical differentiation
= synonyms: derivative, derived function, differential coefficient, first derivative
